template: We have an image with these objects: ['polar bear', 'bird', 'water', 'rocks', 'grass', 'trees', 'pond', 'boulders', 'zoo', 'animal', 'nature', 'wildlife', 'environment', 'zoo exhibit', 'animal enclosure', 'polar bear enclosure', 'bird flying', 'bird in flight', 'bird wings', 'bird beak'].
